misc: Appreciates the thoughtful course designs of Kosti Kuronen who passed away in 2024
biography: Ofri, a golfer hailing from Golf Pirkkala, is known for his quiet intensity and meticulous approach to the game. A resident of Tampere, Finland, Ofri finds inspiration in the serene landscapes and challenging courses of his homeland.

His appreciation extends to the thoughtful course designs of the late Kosti Kuronen, whose work Ofri admires for its blend of strategy and natural beauty. Ofri is known to spend hours studying course layouts, visualizing each shot with unwavering focus.

Hector Trophée 2025 will mark Ofri's third appearance at the event. While he is yet to clinch the coveted Hector Trophée or the Victor Trophy, his dedication and passion suggest that his name may soon be etched into the tournament's history.
